home_Section_2.title: Explore Available Property Types
home_Section_2.description: Browse a wide range of property types to find what suits your needs — from apartments and villas to commercial spaces and lands.

home_Section_4.title: Top Rated Properties You Can Trust
home_Section_4.description: Discover the highest-rated properties handpicked by our community. Quality, comfort, and great locations — all in one place.

home_Section_5.title: Insights & Trends from the Real Estate World
home_Section_5.description: Read our latest blog posts covering everything from market analysis to buying strategies and home living tips.

home_Section_6.title: Our Impact in Numbers
home_Section_6.description: Take a quick look at some of our proud achievements and milestones in the real estate market.

home_Section_7.title: What Our Clients Say
home_Section_7.description: Discover the experiences of our valued clients and how we helped them find their perfect property with ease and confidence.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.intro: Welcome to AqarMap – your first platform to explore real estate in Syria, wherever you are in the world.
who_we_are.sub_1_body:
Our website was created to offer a simple, reliable, and transparent browsing experience for anyone seeking investment opportunities — whether land, apartment, villa, or commercial property, for sale or rent.
We believe real estate is not just a structure… it’s an important decision, and it deserves to be accessed with ease, comfort, and confidence.
who_we_are.sub_2_body:
That’s why we are committed to providing accurate information, clear photos and videos, and complete details for every property.
We are here to be the bridge between you and your real estate opportunity back home.

our_team.subtitle: Our Team
our_team.title: We Are More Than Just a Company… We Are a Family
our_team.description: The AqarMap team consists of passionate experts in real estate, technology, and customer service, working together to deliver the best possible experience for our clients inside and outside Syria.

about_section_2.main_heading: In a market full of randomness and individual efforts, AqarMap was created to be the different model.
about_section_2.main_paragraph: We are not freelancers or brokers working independently — we are a real estate company operating within a professional institutional system, led by a team with international experience in managing and developing real estate markets.

professional_system.title: Professional Institutional System
professional_system.description: We work within an organized structure that ensures quality and consistent follow-up.

global_standards.title: Global Standards
global_standards.description: We follow international standards in listing, documentation, and communication to offer a refined and secure experience.

client_trust.title: Client Trust
client_trust.description: We don’t just sell and disappear — we stay with you with clarity and confidence until you make the right decision, because we believe trust is built, not bought.

contact.teamMessage: Our team is ready to respond to your inquiries and assist you as soon as possible.
